mapper.select: select * from quiz inner join choice on quiz.id = choice.quiz_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quiz (quiz, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{quiz}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp);

INSERT INTO choice (quiz_id, answer1, answer2, answer3, created_at, updated_at) VALUES ((select id from quiz order by id desc limit 1), #{answer1}, #{answer2}, #{answer3}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp);
